Name: Amber Negroni (Difford's recipe)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Review: As the name suggests, this riff on a classic Negroni is amber in colour with honeyed notes and is not quite as bitter as the classic red version.
History: Created in February 2017 by yours truly after the launch of Luxardo's Bitter Bianco liqueur .
Nutrition: One serving of Amber Negroni (Difford's recipe) contains 210 calories
